    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>15439</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">La Bulgaria ad una battuta d'arresto</string>
            <string language="en">Bulgaria in a cross-click</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bulgarien in einem Kreuz-Klicken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Bulgarie dans un cross-clic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bulgária em um cruz-clique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βουλγαρία σε ένα διαγώνιος-στιγμιαίο πάτημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bulgaria en un cruz-tecleo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli allievi imparano i fatti chiave rappresentativi della Bulgaria. I rituali, la gente famosa ed i prodotti nazionali della Bulgaria sono inclusi.</string>
            <string language="en">Students learn representative key facts about Bulgaria. Rituals, famous people and national products of Bulgaria are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Bugaria</string>
            <string language="en">Bugaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Christo Javacheff</string>
            <string language="en">Christo Javacheff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">Valja Balkanska</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Rila monastery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">la Croce di Rila</string>
            <string language="en">Rila cross</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">velingrad</string>
            <string language="en">velingrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">nestinari</string>
            <string language="en">nestinari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Stoichkov</string>
            <string language="en">Stoichkov</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen 
Repräsentativschlüsseltatsachen über Bulgarien. Rituale, 
berühmte Leute und nationale Produkte von Bulgarien sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprennent des faits principaux 
représentatifs sur la Bulgarie. Les rituels, le peuple 
célèbre et les produits nationaux de la Bulgarie sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprendem fatos chaves representativos
sobre Bulgária. Os rituals, os povos famosos e os produtos 
nacionais de Bulgária são incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν τα αντιπροσωπευτικά βασικά 
γεγονότα για τη Βουλγαρία. Τα τελετουργικά, οι διάσημοι 
πληθυσμοί και τα εθνικά προϊόντα της Βουλγαρίας 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenden hechos dominantes 
representativos sobre Bulgaria. Los rituales, la gente famosa y 
los productos nacionales de Bulgaria son incluidos.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Dapprima gli studenti possono collegarsi al sito Internet per avere maggiori informazioni su alcuni fatti chiave riguardanti la Bulgaria. Una volta avuta la necessaria conoscenza, iniziano a riempire le parole crociate numero per numero. Dopo aver terminato il loro compito, i partecipanti possono controllare i loro risultati. Se alcune lettere non corrispondono, queste automaticamente saranno rimosse e gli studenti potranno tentare di nuovo. Una volta completato il compito, ai partecipanti viene fornito il punteggio finale.</string>
            <string language="en">Students first may use the link to the internet site so that they read more information about some key Bulgaria’s facts. After they have gained the necessary knowledge, they look start filling the crossword number by number. 
After finishing the task, the participants can check their results. If some of the items don’t match it is given automatically, the incorrect letters have been removed and students can try again.
After the task is completed, the participants are given the final score.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
